channel.title: France on Nii's Travel Blog
channel.description: Recent content in France on Nii's Travel Blog

item.title: Paris
item.description: Paris! We’re in Paris! This city is absolutely massive compared to Amsterdam. Its a christmas tree graveyard! Walking a lot, then cruisin’ On the first day we spent mostly walking around a lot. We walked from the Bastille area all the way to Notre Dame, all the way to the Louvre! I’m no walker so my legs were pretty shot by the end of the day. There were no lines in Paris.
